title: Login issue
description: Customer cannot log into their account using valid credentials.

title: Billing discrepancy
description: Customer reports being charged twice for the same transaction.

title: Password reset request
description: Customer is unable to reset password via email link.

title: Shipping delay
description: Customer’s order has not arrived after the estimated delivery date.

title: App crash on startup
description: Mobile app crashes immediately after launching on Android devices.

title: Refund request
description: Customer is requesting a refund for a canceled service subscription.

title: Feature request
description: Customer requests dark mode option for the web platform.

title: Incorrect order received
description: Customer received the wrong product in their shipment.

title: Website not loading
description: Customer reports that the main website is not loading on desktop browsers.

title: Subscription cancellation
description: Customer needs help canceling an auto-renewal subscription.

title: Late invoice
description: Customer did not receive the invoice for last month’s usage.

title: Error message during checkout
description: Customer encounters a payment processing error when checking out.

title: Unable to update profile
description: Customer cannot save changes to their profile settings.

title: Gift card not working
description: Customer’s gift card code is being rejected during checkout.
